metadata.name: HackTool - CreateMiniDump Execution
metadata.comment: Detects the use of CreateMiniDump hack tool used to dump the LSASS process memory for credential extraction on the attacker's machine

batch.sql: SELECT * FROM process_activity WHERE time BETWEEN CURRENT_TIMESTAMP() - INTERVAL 24 HOUR AND CURRENT_TIMESTAMP() AND (lower(activity_id) = lower('1') AND endswith(lower(process.name), lower('\\createminidump.exe')) AND contains(lower(process.file.hashes.value), lower('imphash=4a07f944a83e8a7c2525efa35dd30e2f')))

output.summary: Detects the use of CreateMiniDump hack tool used to dump the LSASS process memory for credential extraction on the attacker's machine
